Regulation Name(s): Herpes virus nucleic acid-based cutaneous and mucocutaneous lesion panel
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): illumipro-10™ Automated Isothermal Amplification and Detection System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for illumigene HSV 1&2 DNA Amplification Assay for qualitative detection and differentiation of HSV-1 and HSV-2 using LAMP technology.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro diagnostic test for direct detection and differentiation of HSV-1 and HSV-2 DNA in cutaneous and mucocutaneous lesion specimens from symptomatic patients, as an aid in diagnosis of HSV infection, for laboratory use only.
